solution_line_template: There are {total_rooms}-{rooms_with_two_beds} = <<{total_rooms}-{rooms_with_two_beds}={rooms_with_three_beds}>>{rooms_with_three_beds} rooms with three beds.

There are {rooms_with_three_beds}*{beds_per_three_bed_room} = <<{rooms_with_three_beds}*{beds_per_three_bed_room}={total_beds_three_bed_rooms}>>{total_beds_three_bed_rooms} beds for those hotel rooms that have three beds in them.

There are {rooms_with_two_beds}*{beds_per_two_bed_room} = <<{rooms_with_two_beds}*{beds_per_two_bed_room}={total_beds_two_bed_rooms}>>{total_beds_two_bed_rooms} beds for those hotel rooms that have two beds in them.
